website_summaries.verdict: For the price, it can viewed as a decent entry-level convection oven, but you do get what you pay for.
pros: Low in price and easy to clean
Performs basic functions and includes good-sized extender ring
cons: Some complaints about the unhelpful instruction booklet

customer_reviews.title: but a disappointment in performance
customer_reviews.text: Previously had the big boss cooker which far exceeds the performance of this unit. Works OK, but a disappointment in performance. Doesn't cook as fast as the big boss. A lot of heat loss through the heating unit itself.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie h.

customer_reviews.title: Love the see through glass
customer_reviews.text: Great air fryer. Multiple uses. Large but does the job
customer_reviews.author: K. dillon

customer_reviews.title: OMG! This is a life saver for me. ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This is a life saver for me. I can roast without heating up the entire kitchen. It saves time, and a lot more. The only drawback I can think of is the heating element cannot be thoroughly cleaned due to its attachment to the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Sniveb

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This has been working well for about 2 months. still learning cooking times and temperature settings,. since it cooks a little fast than expected. I have not been able to "fry" anything well...especially sweet potato fires.
customer_reviews.author: scottb

customer_reviews.title: My Wife is extremely disappointed in how this unit cooks
customer_reviews.text: Update on my last review of this item. My Wife is extremely disappointed in how this unit cooks. The cooking elememt (light) is not surrounded my any guard that could reflect the heat downward. Therefore, the unit only cooks the tops of food placed in it. Example: Meat Loaf did not cook at all on the bottom, and was still raw after the correct amount of time. The top was cooked somewhat. Second try: Baking sweet rolls. Also cooked only of the top, bottom was doughy as was the center. Really not the product we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: DL2302

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this a couple of days ago, however everything that I have made in it has turned out perfect. For the moment I just kind of guess at the temperature and the time, although I know eventually I won't have to do that anymore. As of right now I'm making everything in it. For my mother I purchased a NuWave Oven for Christmas and so far I feel that this is as good.. It's easy to clean, its really easy to use and I'm quite pleased with my purchase. Right now I can't comment on durability for long-term use, so fingers crossed that it lasts a year. If it does it was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Catattack

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a juice sucker it keeps blowing the ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a juice sucker it keeps blowing the breaker but the roasted whole chicken is to die for!
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipent

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Day one it worked just fine and I was able to cook in it....day 2 we started it up and we saw the light flash then go off. I was really disappointed because I love using Halogen ovens. My last one stopped working after several years and I wanted a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: MelP86

customer_reviews.title: Love this oven
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful small applience to own if you like to cook healty meals and usually cook for one or two people. I used to avoid baking because I wouldn't want to turn on the oven so ofter for small meals.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomee

customer_reviews.title: Will cook loads of things
customer_reviews.text: We use this constantly for all kinds of food. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: because it came with little instructions on how to use I find myself guessing and guessing wrong. Just wish it had come with better instructions and better receipes
customer_reviews.author: Marian Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Got a air fryer for Christmas and I love it. Hope this one is good too
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use it. Got a air fryer for Christmas and I love it. Hope this one is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Billie G Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Oven & Bad Customer Service by Hometech
customer_reviews.text: I have had my oven for less than 4 months. It started to malfunction and smoke. When I called the manufacturer "Hometech" their Customer Service rep told me that they do not manufacture Halogen ovens which is funny because their name is written on the cover. They refused to help me resolve the issue. WORST Customer Service experience!
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Delish
customer_reviews.text: First time made loin of pork with red potatoes and roasted garlic ...its the greatest
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: It was broken .
customer_reviews.text: My Home tech HT-A11 12 quart 1200w was broker , and I did buy insurance on it , what should I do now ?
customer_reviews.author: SONNY T.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not get the extender ring other than that works fine
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat up the house in the summer time like and oven does
customer_reviews.text: Second one that I brought, will not go with out one. Doesn't heat up the house in the summer time like and oven does. Cooks food very well.
customer_reviews.author: gerard redmann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooking
customer_reviews.text: Easy cooking all around. This machine is great. Awesome purchase....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also did not like how it was set up bought a different that ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work had to send it back. Also did not like how it was set up bought a different that i like
customer_reviews.author: Ms Eve

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: bought 3 only one works the others never even lit up or got hot it just was dead
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have made everything from pork roast to sweet potato fries
customer_reviews.text: I have made everything from pork roast to sweet potato fries. Really like the product. Only drawback is I have a very small cooking area and unit tends to put off a lot of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy my hometech 12 Quart 1300
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy my hometech 12 Quart 1300 . My kids ate my chicken and thought it was fried . I refuse to tell them the truth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: not very happy yet it came with like basically no instructions has parts i dont even know what are for very bad on that part so i guess trial and error or send it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all that glitters is gold.
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the weakest and most deficient. He just arrived and tried and instantly melted his hot lamp. Sun on its weak performance at the time I have to wait 10 days for Amazon to give me back the money.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham ortíz

customer_reviews.title: Love mine.  I have owned several (various brands).
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily, seldom turning on my real oven. Cooks well with practice. Reheats foods better than microwave. Toasts large English Muffins, rolls, etc. Based on other brands previously owned, I expect to have to replace it every two to three years, as the heater burns out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Counter Top Oven
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this model but this is my 3rd; NuWave, Big Boss now this. All of which have been great but I liked the design and a few other features that weren't available on the first 2 like the plastic dome cover and faulty knobs, respectively. I am looking forward to years of use since both previous models served their purpose with a long life. Don't disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: DynaMike

customer_reviews.title: Hometech Halogen works fine
customer_reviews.text: I like the large glass bowl because of the ease of cleaning. I tried it out right away and was pretty happy with it. If you are use to using a NuWave Oven, then just keep in mind this is another cooker and adjust how you use it and at what level you are cooking your foods. Experimenting is the key. I still prefer the NuWave Oven oven this Halogen for fast cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Purchased This One
customer_reviews.text: This is the second halogen cooker that I have purchased and this one is better because it comes with the expansion ring. Without the ring you will burn most items that you are trying to cook on the rack, like salmon. This one works perfectly, cleans up great and the bottom of the burner is stainless steel instead of unpainted, uncoated rusty steel. Best yet, you can't beat the price. There are a bunch of them on the market and I am glad I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Wittmer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in timely manner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a back up for our other halogen cooker. We spend the winter in Las Vegas for 7 months. We really like these for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Bharnz1

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several versions of this appliance over 30 years. This one does not cut it. Very slow to start up. long time to warm up. not get to set temp. ( verfed with oven thermos).
customer_reviews.author: RGB

customer_reviews.title: Half the time & all of the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I use this every chance I can, it's so easy to use, takes 1/2 the time and the food turns out so much better than in a regular oven.
customer_reviews.author: April Shirk

customer_reviews.title: Love my little cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love my little cooker. We have made Stromboli and the bread came out nice and crispy on top. Pork chops with Pablo coating toasted nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy9685

customer_reviews.title: They enjoy this new replacement
customer_reviews.text: Gift this to my grandparents because their move expensive version had died out on them after some serious yrs of use! They enjoy this new replacement. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: ANGIE B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Still experimenting, but really like the different options of cooking. Cuts cooking time dramatically. Bonus is it comes with rack and cooking pan, many options. Clean-up was a breeze
customer_reviews.author: pozie31

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my roommate for Christmas. I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my roommate for Christmas. I am moving out and got one for me as well. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Edward P. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Vendor had a great customer service and was very prompt to refund my ...
customer_reviews.text: Machine does not work. I had it on max for over an hour and didn't cook thin pork chops... I sent back for a refund. Vendor had a great customer service and was very prompt to refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: L. H.

customer_reviews.title: Must have product
customer_reviews.text: Love it makes great grill chicken and fries without the fat. This is a replacement of another unit by another company that did not function well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, my only complaint is that doesn't cook fast enough

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not heating up well so it does not cook as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for disabled folks
customer_reviews.text: I buy my handicapped brother one every 2 years. He lives alone and he uses this at least twice a day.

customer_reviews.title: love that I can see it cook
customer_reviews.text: Cooks evenly and quickly, love that I can see it cook.

customer_reviews.title: Great  product
customer_reviews.text: The price was great and the product works fine love the display with the cooking time on the head so I don't have to go to the manual.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
